About Me

Me. Myself and I...

BIO

DOB: 25/04/1994

I'm a passionate Software Developer with a love for learning all things related to Game and Web Application Development.

I'm an alumnus of the Letterkenny Institute of Technology, I hold BSc degree in Computing and Game Development as well as an honours BSc degree in Computer Sciences and Game Development.The mechanics and algorithmic complexity is what drew me to the development of video game software.

Keeping with the ever changing evolution of software design, I have advanced my existing skill in technologies such as Java, C#, and the Unity3D game engine, while also learning new frameworks when neccessary (see below).

To view my body of work, please visit my GitHub profile here. Descriptions and source code of my projects can also be found in the work section of this domain. A PDF copy of my CV may be found, here

To network with me, feel free to drop an email at ieulabdeen.zain@gmail.com or find me on LinkedIn here


WORK EXPERIENCE

Lunar Experiences, Ellicott City, Maryland, U.S.A (link)

September – March 2016 Game Programming Intern

Worked on Lunar Destiny, a VR rover racing game set on the Moon. Game was developed in the Unity3D game engine, C# was used to script game functionality. Responsibilities included designing and/or implementing game functionality, meeting weekly Agile sprint deadlines and using a code repository.

Freelance Game Developer

October – November 2017 Freelancing

Worked on a sports themed IP for a client. Game was developed in the Unity3D game engine. C# was used to script game functionality. Responsibilities included implementing the designs specified by the client, working on an already existing codebase and communicating regularly with the client to ensure they were satisfied with the implementation. Game was built for Android.

Self-Learning (link)

Have worked on a number of projects

Please see my GitHub and/or CV.
